RebateClaim.name: RebateClaim
RebateClaim.description: Represents proof of sale of a vehicle submitted by a dealer in the form of a retail delivery report. This report can also be used for rebate payout calculations.

AssetId.description: The asset associated with the record.

AssetIdentificationNumber.description: The unique identifier of the associated vehicle or asset, such as a vehicle identification number or serial number of an accessory.

AssetSaleType.description: Specifies the type of sale that's associated with the rebate claim.

ClaimAmount.description: The amount claimed by the dealer.

ClaimDate.description: The date when the claim is submitted by the dealer.

ClaimedByAccountId.description: The account of the dealer who is submitting the claim.

ClaimedByAccountNumber.description: The reference number of the account of the dealer who is submitting the claim.

LastReferencedDate.description: The most recent date on which a user referenced this record.

LastViewedDate.description: The most recent date on which a user viewed this record.

Name.description: Autogenerated unique identifier for the rebate claim record.

OwnerId.description: ID of the rebate claim record owner.

ParticipatingAccountId.description: The account of a participant in the claim. It can be the end customer or a partner.

ParticipatingAccountNumber.description: The reference number of the account of a participant in the claim.

ProcessingStatus.description: The processing status of the rebate claim.

ProcessingStatusMessage.description: The message with the details of the rebate claim’s processing status when it isn’t completed.

ProductCode.description: The reference number of the product for which the rebate claim is submitted.

ProductId.description: The product for which the rebate claim is submitted.

ProgramReferenceNumber.description: The reference number of the rebate program that the dealer is enrolled in. Note Use this field if you have enabled Rebate Management in your org.

Quantity.description: The quantity of the product for which the rebate claim is submitted.

ReferencePricePerUnit.description: The price of a product unit that’s agreed upon between the manufacturer and the dealer or between the dealer and customer for the rebate claim.

ResalePricePerUnit.description: The price at which a unit of the product was bought by the customer.

SaleApprovalDate.description: The date on which the manufacturer approves the retail delivery report (RDR) of the dealer and acknowledges the sale of the vehicle.

SalePricePerUnit.description: The original price at which a product unit is sold to the dealer by the manufacturer.

TradedFromAccountId.description: The account of the dealer who sells a product to another dealer or distributor who further fulfills the final demand.

TradedToAccountId.description: The account of the dealer who purchases a product from another dealer or distributor to complete their inventory requirement.

VehicleDeliveryStatus.description: Specifies the delivery status of the associated vehicle.

VehicleDlvrOdometerReading.description: The odometer reading that’s taken at the time of vehicle delivery.

VehicleId.description: The vehicle associated with the rebate claim.
